poems.author: Laura Hershey
poems.body:
The city's renting special vans,
the daily paper reads,

poems.author: Natasha Rao
poems.body: Despite my efforts to remain indifferent, I hate that my boyfriend has dated girls with names I use all the time,

poems.author: Sylvia Plath
poems.body:
First, are you our sort of a person?
Do you wear

poems.author: Sandra Haight
poems.body:
Computer age impasse...the strength of one
            the fear of stroke of midnight had begun.
